title: Section Nav
description: Secondary navigation for a section of a website.

samples.name: default
samples.text: Programs of Study Undergraduate Degrees Animal Sciences Major Pre-Veterinary and Medical Companion Animal Equine Computer & Animal Science Some Third Thing

attributes-text.name: label
attributes-text.description: Accessible label for the menu, and also the text of the toggle when collapsed

attributes.name: collapse
attributes.description: Force to always collapse (true) or never collapse (false)

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Set the menu to be open by default when collapsed

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--margin-top
css-variables.description: Margin above when not collapsed [default: 1.5em]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--collapsed--margin-bottom
css-variables.description: Margin below when collapsed [default: 1.5em]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--collapsed--border
css-variables.description: Bottom border when collapsed [default: 2px solid var(--il-blue)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--line-height
css-variables.description: Line height for links [default: 1.2rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--color
css-variables.description: Normal link text color [default: var(--il-blue)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--color--focus
css-variables.description: Focused link text color [default: var(--il-blue)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--color--hover
css-variables.description: Hover link text color [default: var(--il-altgeld)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--color--active
css-variables.description: Active link text color [default: var(--il-altgeld)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--level-padding
css-variables.description: Left indentation for levels [default: 0.9375rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--level2-padding
css-variables.description: Specific indentation for level 2 children [default: 1.5625rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--level0-font-size
css-variables.description: First level children font size [default: 1.125rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--level1-font-size
css-variables.description: Font size for all deeper children [default: 1rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--font-weight
css-variables.description: Font weight for menu items [default: 600]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--item--height
css-variables.description: Height of a nav element [default: 2.75rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--item--padding-top
css-variables.description: Top padding for a nav item [default: 0.7rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--item--padding-right
css-variables.description: Right padding for a nav item [default: 0.625rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--item--padding-bottom
css-variables.description: Bottom padding for a nav item [default: 0.7rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--item--padding-left
css-variables.description: Left padding for a nav item [default: 1.25rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--level1-border
css-variables.description: Top border for first level items [default: 1px solid var(--il-storm-lighter-3)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--root--font-size
css-variables.description: Font size for the root link [default: 1.25rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--root--background
css-variables.description: Background for the root link [default: var(--il-storm-lighter-4)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--root--font-weight
css-variables.description: Font weight for the root link [default: 700]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--font-size
css-variables.description: Font size for the toggle when collapsed [default: 1rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--background
css-variables.description: Background for the toggle [default: #E8E9EB]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--font
css-variables.description: Font family for the toggle [default: var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--font-weight
css-variables.description: Font weight for the toggle [default: 400]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--border
css-variables.description: Bottom border for the toggle [default: 1px solid var(--il-storm-lighter-3)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--toggle--background--active
css-variables.description: Active background for the toggle [default: var(--il-arches-lighter-3)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--current--symbol
css-variables.description: Symbol shown in front of the current page in the nav [default: "â–¸ "]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--current--size
css-variables.description: Size of the current page symbol [default: 0.35rem]

css-variables.name: --ilw-section-nav--current--left
css-variables.description: Left margin for the current page symbol [default: -0.6875rem]
